New Records: The Texas Rangers secured their first World Series appearance since 2011 with their victory in Game 7 of the ALCS.
Key Match Events: Adolis Garc√≠a hit two home runs and drove in five runs, leading the Rangers to an 11-4 win over the Astros in Game 7 of the ALCS.

Post-Match Reflections: The Texas Rangers celebrated their series victory, marking their first World Series appearance since 2011 and their fans' excitement.
